attributes.action: stop messing around with General Practice (the most efficient part of the NHS with 84% patient satisfaction on access) and sort out NHS Dentistry (before I have remove my own teeth with a clawhammer).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gp's and hospital doctors would just like to get on with making people better.  Please do not keep making changes and imposing targets.  Let doctors help people.
